import React from "react" import './style.css' const Todo = () => { const [check, setCheck] = React.useState ([ { name: "CSS", completed: true }, { name: "JavaScript", completed: true }, { name: "Learn React", completed: false }, { name: "Learn mongoDB", completed: false }, { name: "Learn Node JS", completed: false }, ]) return (

{check[0].name}

{check[1].name}

{check[2].name}

{check[3].name}

{check[4].name}

) } export default Todo
